summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.6°C) and outside temperature (up 2.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.7 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1725 m), light levels (up 2955 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.2°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 139.8m lower than yesterday, 624.5m lower than the past week, 1725.4m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 927.1m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and near calm conditions. Rain showers likely, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and strong and powerful sunlight. Changeable conditions.
